last_episode_to_air.name: Checkmate
last_episode_to_air.overview: Perez manipulates Robbie into handing him control of the company. Meanwhile, Kosgrove endures a plastic surgery disaster, Bernice and Reva's food truck gets stolen, and Jerome's PTSD spirals out of control.

name: South Beach Tow
overview: South Beach Tow is an American truTV reality television series that portrays dramatized reenactments of the day-to-day business of Tremont Towing. Although the program is fictionalized, Tremont Towing is a real Miami towing company. The series premiered on July 20, 2011. The first part of Season 2 premiered on September 19, 2012, and returned after a four month hiatus on May 15, 2013. Season 3 will premiere on October 30, 2013.

episodes.name: A Family Business
episodes.overview: When Christie discovers a dog locked in a hot SUV, she summons Animal Rescue. The repo of a rapper's pimped-out car leads to a high-speed chase. Robbie defends his sister's honor from an angry passenger whose taxi has been towed from a high-end hotel.

episodes.name: Tow Wars
episodes.overview: A wedding cake is damaged after Jerome tows a delivery van, and Christie deals with the outraged baker. A boat repo sparks a gun-wielding confrontation on the water. And, Robbie has a violent run-in with a rival towing company.

episodes.name: Chaos in the Yard
episodes.overview: Robbie tows an illegally parked rental car from the middle of a music video shoot, with chaotic results. Eddie's bad behavior triggers an ultimatum from Robert Sr.

episodes.name: Broken Truce
episodes.overview: A short-staffed Robert Sr. jumps back in the saddle for a routine tow, only to have a hostile encounter with rowdy teenagers. Tremont's truce with the rival towing company ends with another attempted poach, forcing Robbie to turn the tables.

episodes.name: Training Day
episodes.overview: Eddie needs back-up when he's threatened by posers trying to stop the tow of their car, the Tremont staff contends with a belligerent backyard wrestler, and Robert hires a driver away from his rival towing company, with disastrous results.

episodes.name: Anger Management
episodes.overview: New driver Bernice continues to violate Tremont protocol, forcing a showdown with Robert. Plus, Eddie confronts a larger-than-life couple with a fake handicap placard.

episodes.name: Muay Thai Surprise
episodes.overview: A repo from a yoga studio goes awry when father and son tangle with the vehicle owner -- a cage fighter with anger issues. Plus, Eddie has a run-in with the rival towing company, and Bernice makes a surprise appearance.

episodes.name: Memorial Day Mayhem
episodes.overview: With Robert in the hospital, Robbie Jr. and Christie must run the company on the busiest towing weekend of the year, and fend off an invasion by their rivals.

episodes.name: Growing Pains
episodes.overview: With Robert in the hospital, Robbie Jr. and Christie must run the company on the busiest towing weekend of the year, and fend off an invasion by their rivals.

episodes.name: Taking Out The Trash
episodes.overview: The move to a new facility puts Robert Sr. and his staff to the test; Robert Jr. has a run-in with skater punks; newly rehired Bernice goes rogue on a repo; and Christie is threatened by an ex-con who storms the yard.

episodes.name: Assault on Tremont Towing
episodes.overview: Robert Jr. gets caught with his guard down while repossessing a Porsche, but new driver Perez bails him out; a loudmouthed rich girl sends Bernice over the edge.

episodes.name: Sand in the Face
episodes.overview: Perez tows a custom Chevy and is blitzed by a gang of football fans back at the yard; Bernice and Robert Jr. repossess a Mustang and find themselves in the crosshairs of trigger-happy paintballers.

episodes.name: The Hurricane
episodes.overview: Perez has a brush with a slightly mental dental patient; Bernice and Robert Jr. interrupt a seaside photo shoot, where they encounter an old nemesis. Later, an irate vehicle owner absconds with Robert Jr.'s truck, and Perez rides to the rescue.

episodes.name: Unlicensed to Drive
episodes.overview: After their RV gets towed, the owners camp out in the company waiting room. Meanwhile, Bernice's former coworkers jump her on a job, so she calls for some backup muscle.

episodes.name: Stranded
episodes.overview: Eddie has a run-in with a wealthy young lady in a pink sports car; a lemur gets loose in the waiting room; Robert Jr. and Bernice go on a road trip to repossess a vehicle at an auto show.

episodes.name: Search and Rescue
episodes.overview: Robbie and Perez encounter a pair of machete-wielding pot farmers while repossessing an airboat in the Everglades. Meanwhile, Bernice's altercation with a vehicle owner results in a car door getting torn off its hinges.

episodes.name: A Very Tremont Christmas
episodes.overview: Bernice and Jerome set out on a rescue mission to the Everglades; Christie's solo tow attempt yields destructive results.

episodes.name: The Dog House
episodes.overview: The Tremont crew receives a mysterious present; Bernice's tow job at a massage parlor rubs someone the wrong way; Eddie and Perez are confronted by a pugilistic preacher's wife during the repossession of a luxury car.

episodes.name: Money All Day
episodes.overview: A life-threatening confrontation results from Bernice towing a car belonging to a guy under house arrest; and an irate dog-walker has a bone to pick with the staff. Later, Tremont is rocked by a surprising revelation.

episodes.name: Trouble at Tremont
episodes.overview: Bernice gets revenge on Perez during a repo at a custom-auto shop; Eddie gets in a jam at a fast-food drive-through. Later, Robert Sr. discovers a dark side to Perez, and it has an impact on the company.

episodes.name: Goodfellas
episodes.overview: Robbie attempts to bring Christie back to Tremont; and Bernice has a run-in with a group of pushy frat guys. Later, Robbie and Jerome run into problems while towing a limo from a busy hotel.

episodes.name: Bernice Pops Off
episodes.overview: Tremont's move to a new facility tests Robert Sr. and his staff.

episodes.name: The Heat Is On
episodes.overview: Robert Jr. lets his guard down while attempting to repo a Porsche, with brutal consequences.

episodes.name: Lights Out
episodes.overview: Perez's tow of a custom Chevy leads a pack of rowdy football fans to the tow yard.

episodes.name: No Country for Perez
episodes.overview: Perez tangles with an out-of-control dental patient..

episodes.name: Ruthless
episodes.overview: The tow of an RV leads to an off-the-wall couple taking up residence in the Tremont waiting room.

episodes.name: What`s Up With Christie
episodes.overview: Eddie is accosted by a nasty rich girl with a pink BMW - and a secret.

episodes.name: The Last To Know
episodes.overview: Jerome does a good deed for disgruntled senior citizens; Larry crashes the party on an Ocean Drive repo; Eddie bags a red-faced spa patron; Christie breaks her secret news to her father...

episodes.name: Black Dahlia
episodes.overview: A comely new dispatcher stirs up things at Tremont; Bernice and Perez have a run-in with a passel of partying parolees; and Robbie is fed some misinformation and gets burned.

episodes.name: The Inspection
episodes.overview: A surprise inspection puts Tremont's survival in jeopardy. Robbie gets blasted with an earful while locked inside a repo. Bernice saves the day, but more bad news brings big changes.

episodes.name: Hit it and Quit it
episodes.overview: Jerome's player ways cause problems on the road; Christie looks for a new dispatcher; and Bernice gets into a sticky situation during a repo.

episodes.name: Storm Clouds
episodes.overview: With Larry's loan due in ten days, news of an impending tropical storm throws the Tremont crew into a panic.

episodes.name: Go Down Towing
episodes.overview: A delinquent reptile wrangler shoots Robbie with a tranquilizer gun; and Robert Sr. goes missing.

episodes.name: Snakes in the Yard
episodes.overview: Robert Sr. still hasn't turned up; and Robbie doesn't have the funds to pay off their loan. Meanwhile, snakes have overrun the yard; and Jerome's stalker is still on the loose.

episodes.name: Who's The Boss?
episodes.overview: Christie's due date nears, prompting Robert to contemplate a major decision; a repo involving a hairstylist turns surprisingly profitable for Bernice.

episodes.name: Run These Streets
episodes.overview: The family welcome a new member; Christie makes a surprising decision about her future; a new dispatcher struggles at the office; and Tremont's not happy about an old rival's return.

episodes.name: Wide Load
episodes.overview: Dave learns a surprising secret about Bernice, which leads to an awkward situation for him; Bernice reluctantly takes on day-care duty.

episodes.name: Compromising Positions
episodes.overview: Bernice's big test for her towing license looms; Jerome's girlfriend learns about his playboy reputation; Robbie and Perez have trouble working together, so their repo does not go smoothly.

episodes.name: For Love or J-Money
episodes.overview: Jerome uses uncommon tactics to try to win back his ex-girlfriend, causing problems at work; Robbie makes a surprising choice.

episodes.name: The In-Laws
episodes.overview: Jerome meets his future in-laws, and it doesn't go well; Bernice helps a rapper with a song; Robbie's latest mistake outshines Perez's error.

episodes.name: Everybody Hates Tremont
episodes.overview: The company receives backlash, and Eddie bears the brunt of it; Robbie gets suspended; Christie comes back to work full time; Perez's authority is tested by Bernice.

episodes.name: Big and Beautiful
episodes.overview: Perez takes charge of the business, but his management style doesn't sit well with the drivers.

episodes.name: Bumps in the Night
episodes.overview: When Perez hires an old friend to replace Eddie, Tremont's new driver violates a major rule of towing; Bernice, Kosgrove, and Jerome try to repo a Bentley from a spooky mansion.

episodes.name: Tremont on Wheels
episodes.overview: A dangerous carbon monoxide leak forces Tremont into less than glamorous new digs. Meanwhile, Jerome's engagement to Wanda is in jeopardy when his crazy stalker resurfaces in a big way.

episodes.name: Kosgrove Gets Krunk
episodes.overview: Jerome's past catches up with him and threatens his upcoming wedding; Bernice unexpectedly shows up at the set of a music video; Kosgrove's drunken behavior causes trouble for Eddie.

episodes.name: Christie's Choice
episodes.overview: Robbie and Perez struggle for control of Tremont, with their fate in Christie's hands. Jerome's in store for a big surprise after long day's work, and Bernice takes an unsuspecting bus tour group on a trip through the hood.

episodes.name: A Tremont Wedding
episodes.overview: Jerome's wedding plans are sabotaged, putting his relationship in jeopardy. Meanwhile, Robbie and Perez await Senior's decision about who will be Tremont's next boss.

episodes.name: Tremont Got Served
episodes.overview: Three weeks after her promotion to General Manager, Christie is faced with Tremont's biggest crisis yet; Jerome transitions out of his honeymoon phase; Kosgrove faces the consequences of living extravagantly.

episodes.name: Caged Heat
episodes.overview: With only 72 hours until Tremont's eviction, Christie scrambles to raise the funds to move the company to a new facility. Meanwhile, Bernice goes after a high-stakes boat repo, and Kosgrove walks into a dangerous trap

episodes.name: Bernice Goes Down
episodes.overview: On the eve of Tremont's eviction, Bernice suffers a shocking injury and Eddie has an office blow-up - leading Christie to make a critical decision about the company's future. Meanwhile, Kosgrove accidentally swallows Jerome's wedding ring.

episodes.name: Here Kitty
episodes.overview: Overwhelmed by Tremont's move to a new towyard, Christie considers promoting a driver to Assistant Manager. Meanwhile, Bernice lays the smack down on a celebrity impersonator, and a dangerous run-in with local wildlife reunites Jerome with his ex.

episodes.name: Dave's Dance-Battle
episodes.overview: After learning how to Prancercise, Kosgrove puts his new skills to the test during a repo with Bernice. Meanwhile, Perez butts heads with the women of Tremont, and Eddie's anger management therapy takes a bizarre turn.

episodes.name: Bernice's Revenge
episodes.overview: After a confrontation with a pair of nasty newlyweds, Bernice drags her unwitting coworkers on a vengeful repo road trip - all the way to Key West. Meanwhile, Robbie loses Kosgrove's beloved dog, and Eddie struggles to keep his cool during a grueling night shift at the office.

episodes.name: The Incredible Journey
episodes.overview: Stuck in Key West, Bernice and her crew scramble to locate their missing tow truck, with the wrath of both Christie and Wanda looming overhead. Meanwhile, Robbie races against time to find Kosgrove's lost dog, and things take a turn for the weird between Eddie and his therapist.

episodes.name: Roommates
episodes.overview: After Wanda throws him out, Jerome moves in with Bernice and her mom. Meanwhile, Christie helps Kosgrove venture into the world of online dating, and Robbie's illicit repo deal may lead to an unlikely partnership.

episodes.name: Bernice Unleashed
episodes.overview: While Christie attends a towing convention in Baltimore, Bernice struggles to maintain order at Tremont. Meanwhile, Kosgrove goes on a disastrous coffee date, and Robbie's illicit repo scheme threatens to unravel.

episodes.name: Casanova Kosgrove
episodes.overview: Kosgrove turns to Jerome and Bernice for dating advice, with disastrous consequences. Meanwhile, Robbie tries for one last score before ending his secret repo side-business.

episodes.name: Touchy-Feely
episodes.overview: Tremont threatens to collapse as Christie unravels her employees secrets, with explosive consequences. Meanwhile, Eddie's new age therapist sees an opportunity for healing at the workplace.

episodes.name: Fashion Disaster
episodes.overview: Jerome's stalker returns to wreak havoc at Wanda's fashion show. Meanwhile, Perez approaches Robbie with a shady money-making opportunity.

episodes.name: The Struggle Is Real
episodes.overview: Kosgrove learns the true identity of his internet romance. Meanwhile, Perez and Robbie's secret partnership takes an explosive turn, and Christie is presented with an opportunity that could change everything at Tremont.

episodes.name: Face Plant
episodes.overview: Bernice confronts Christie about a buyout proposal for Tremont while Robbie and Perez find that their side business isn't for the faint of heart. Jerome pines for Wanda while he and Bernice deal with the fallout of a sorority party, and Dave's casino date turns into a swampy struggle for survival.

episodes.name: Game Changer
episodes.overview: Jerome and Bernice venture into the Everglades to rescue Kosgrove. Robbie fnds a new employee in an old acquaintance. Eddie learns what life on the farm is really like, and Christie discovers some game-changing information about the possible sale of Tremont.

episodes.name: Little Man, Big Donk
episodes.overview: Bernice gives Tremont's new driver, Davy, a towing tutorial. Kosgrove's unusual new car draws some unwanted attention. Eddie returns to find that times are tough at Tremont. Jerome acts on his suspicions toward Wanda. And Perez drops some heavy news on Robbie that turns his world upside down.

episodes.name: Take the Money
episodes.overview: Perez offers Robbie a loan to settle up with Christie. Eddie comes back to Tremont on new terms. Jerome gets antsy with his private eye. When Kosgrove's donk is stolen, the Tremont family scrambles to track it down. Christie makes a final decision about the future of Tremont.

episodes.name: Spanglish
episodes.overview: Christie faces the repercussions of turning down Felix's offer. Bernice highjacks a test drive. Kosgrove's broken Spanish puts him and Eddie in jeopardy, and arrows fly when Perez and Robbie try to repo a huge RV.

episodes.name: Creepin
episodes.overview: Bernice and Davy attempt to repo an elusive yacht. Eddie has a shocking experience with an electronic billboard truck. Kosgrove unwittingly agrees to a drastic life change. Jerome visits Wanda in Atlanta for the first (and last) time.

episodes.name: Sink or Swim
episodes.overview: Jerome and Davy encounter a brokedown party bus. Robbie repos a Corvette and comes face to face with a paint sprayer. Bernice goes to new extremes to repossess a yacht. Marielix drops a bomb on Kosgrove.

episodes.name: Adios Kosgrove
episodes.overview: The Tremont gang gathers to say goodbye to a Venezuela-bound Kosgrove. Meanwhile, Robbie is forced to infiltrate a chop shop, and Davy squares off against an aggressive 12-year-old.

episodes.name: Mystery Date
episodes.overview: Christie unravels the secret of Perez's side-business. Meanwhile, Bernice discovers the identity of her secret admirer, and Eddie dispenses wisdom to an irate vehicle owner.

episodes.name: 50 Shades of Bernice
episodes.overview: Bernice uses her sex appeal to score a big-money repo. Meanwhile, Jerome declares his love for Brandiss -- and attracts renewed attention from his stalker.

episodes.name: Perez Strikes Back
episodes.overview: Perez files a consumer complaint against Tremont, prompting a surprise inspection from Kosgrove's arch-nemesis. Meanwhile, Jerome deals with the fallout from a drunken fling with his crazy sexy stalker, and Bernice goes head-to-head with Robbie on a repo.

episodes.name: On the Floor
episodes.overview: Tremont unravels in the wake of failing its county inspection. Meanwhile, Jerome's stalker makes a mess of his tows, and Bernice's mom delivers a shocking ultimatum.

episodes.name: Deuces, Tremont
episodes.overview: As both Tremont and R&P unravel, Christie makes a shocking decision. Meanwhile, Bernice prepares to move to Detroit with her mom, while Jerome's stalker hits new levels of craziness.

episodes.name: Apocalypse Tow
episodes.overview: Christie and the gang find that fire ants are only one of their problems; Davy plays cat and mouse with a lady bodybuilder; Jerome finds himself consoling a rapping mermaid.

episodes.name: Flipping Out
episodes.overview: While Christie and Perez scramble to find a new tow yard, Eddie and Davy are stuck on the streets with a $600,000 car on the hook; Bernice loses it on a wannabe rapper; Jerome plays hero to a distraught young woman with a thirst for revenge.

episodes.name: Legend of the Swamp Ape
episodes.overview: Eager for a quick buck, Perez forces Kosgrove to pose as a mythical swamp beast . with disastrous consequences. Meanwhile, Bernice contends with J-Money and his "Mini-Money" on a repo, and Davy faces the wrath of one of Miami's top models.

episodes.name: Pulling the Plug
episodes.overview: Bernice and Reva's food truck has a disastrous opening night. Jerome loses track of Mini-Money during a chaotic tow, and a shocking accident befalls Kosgrove.

episodes.name: A Taste of Bernice
episodes.overview: Bernice is forced to stage a marathon dinner party for Inspector Santiago. Jerome and Mini-Money charm the ladies of South Beach, while an understaffed Christie contemplates a surprising new hire.

episodes.name: Maximum Power
episodes.overview: Bernice considers an unethical offer to upgrade her food truck. Perez's first repo with new hire Nikki leads to a death-defying chase, and Davy has a terrifying encounter with his 'roid-raging nemesis.

episodes.name: Family Therapy
episodes.overview: Bernice, Jerome, and Mini-Money go undercover for an unconventional repo; Eddie squares off against a nature-hating redneck; Kosgrove has a run-in with a skunk.

episodes.name: Towyard of Terror
episodes.overview: Bernice, Jerome, and Reva explore a haunted hospital; Christie and Perez interrogate Nikki about the missing bank deposit; Kosgrove is stalked by a sinister clown.

episodes.name: The Customer is Always Wrong
episodes.overview: The grand opening of "Hood Tacos" brings mayhem to Miami when Bernice tries her hand - and fist - at "customer service." Meanwhile, Jerome falls for his amnesia-stricken stalker, and Davy has a late-night rendezvous with female body builder Constellation.

episodes.name: Crazy In Love
episodes.overview: Jerome's stalker regains her memory, with electrifying consequences. A scheming Perez sees an opportunity in Robbie's return to the company. Bernice and Reva decide to "keep it real" with their customers at Hood Tacos, and the people of Miami are suckers for punishment.

episodes.name: South Beach Glo
episodes.overview: GloZell Green works a shift in the dispatch office; Bernice rescues Jerome from the clutches of his stalker; Robbie plays dress-up with a sexy housewife.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Bernice and her mom start their own food truck; Kosgrove encounters Swamp Ape; J-Money gets a side-kick who isn't even old enough to drive.

episodes.name: Checkmate
episodes.overview: Perez manipulates Robbie into handing him control of the company. Meanwhile, Kosgrove endures a plastic surgery disaster, Bernice and Reva's food truck gets stolen, and Jerome's PTSD spirals out of control.
